reasoning: Cystinuria is a lifelong autosomal recessive genetic disorder affecting cystine reabsorption. Prevalence estimated at ~7 per 100k based on birth prevalence of 1:10,000-1:15,000. Using prevalence metric appropriate for genetic disorders with lifelong manifestation.
source: Goodyer P et al. (2015). Cystinuria. In: Endotext. South Dartmouth (MA): MDText.com, Inc.
